SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: THE FOUNDATION RECEIVES WRITTEN PROPOSALS FROM STUDENTS FOR SCHOLARSHIPS AND GRANTS FOR EDUCATION.

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: WRITTEN PROPOSAL OR REQUEST INFORMATION BY EMAIL.

ReasonableCauseExplanation.ExplanationTxt: Due to the Hurricane Lee deadline extension for Maine until February 15, 2024, I respectfully request that late penalties due under IRC Section 6652(c)(1)(A) and 6652(c)(3) be waived for reasonable cause under Regulation 301.6652-2f.
